text: The 2018 season for began in January at the Tour Down Under. As a UCI WorldTeam, they were automatically invited and obligated to send a squad to every event in the UCI World Tour. ==Team roster== ;Riders who joined the team for the 2018 season {| class="wikitable" |- !Rider !2017 team |- |Fabio Aru|| |- |Sven Erik Bystrom|| |- |Alexander Kristoff|| |- |Daniel Martin|| |- |Alexandr Riabushenko|| neo–pro |- |Rory Sutherland|| |} ;Riders who left the team during or after the 2017 season {| class="wikitable" |- !Rider !2018 team |- |Sacha Modolo|| |- |Louis Meintjes || |- |Andrea Guardini || Bardiani-CSF |- |Matej Mohoric || |- |Marko Kump|| |- |Federico Zurlo|| Team MsTina–Focus |} ==Season victories== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
